message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a [product description - be specific and enticing] that I believe will be a valuable asset to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, based on my current budget and assessment of the product's worth to me, I am willing to pay no more than $15000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
